name: Baldi's Evil Plan
description:
This is a mod where baldi has a plan to get rid of you once and for all. It's up to you to stop baldi's evil plan. You need to collect all 7 notebooks, and get out of the school to stop baldi's plan. It won't be easy though, baldi and his friends will be after you.

This mod does have a few references from everyone helps baldi, but it's different.

Credits:

Mystman12 for the original baldi's basics.

SplintaDinta for the baldi model.

Superinky for the bully model.

Uberduck for the texts to speech.

Wowzaboi for the student model.
